typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		name as string,
		date as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(asset_id,
		fund_id,
		name,
		date,
		type)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testUnique.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
